label: Notebook Interface
title: Training wheels for the command line
details: Our advanced notebook interface makes coding and documentation effortless. With real-time preview, syntax highlighting, and intuitive controls, you can focus on your ideas instead of formatting. Perfect for research, experimentation, and technical documentation.

label: Collaborative Coding
title: Real-time Team Collaboration
details: Work together seamlessly with your team in real-time. Changes sync instantly across all devices, with smart conflict resolution and version history. Boost productivity and keep everyone on the same page with our collaborative notebook environment.

label: AI Integration
title: Intelligent Coding Assistant
details: Leverage the power of AI to enhance your development workflow. Get smart code suggestions, automated documentation, and intelligent error detection. Our AI assistant learns from your coding style to provide personalized recommendations.
